item.description:
You are invited to join the Cardboard Players Club poker club for Home Games online.

- If you don't already have it, download the free PokerStars software from www.pokerstars.net
- Open the main poker lobby, then click on the Home Games tab
- Click the 'Join a Poker Club' button
- Enter our Club ID number: 650411
- Enter the Invitation Code: fouraceswins

Once your membership request is approved, you can sign up for the tournament and you'll be ready to play!

Feel free to ask if you have any questions!

FAQ:

Is there a charge for this? No.  The software is free.  Membership in the club is free.  Your tournament entry is free.  Free, free, free.

Is this legal? Yes.  Because there's no money involved, it's completely legal.

How many people can play? As many as sign up!  The software will automatically configure the starting tables to accommodate everyone.

What do I get if I win? Bragging rights.  Nothing more or less.

How long will the tournament last? That depends on the number of players, but, like a home tournament, the blinds go up so the tournament will move fairly quickly.  Our inaugural tournament was over in under an hour.

Why should I do this? It's fun!

Do I have to know how to play Texas Hold 'em? No, in fact it's a great way to learn.  The software won't let you do anything that's against the rules, and it will automatically fold your hand if you don't make a different decision within a certain amount of time.  Plus, your friends will be there to help!
item.how_to_find_us: Just be signed onto PokerStars a few minutes before 7:00 and you'll be taken directly to your table!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Free Online Texas Hold 'em Poker Tourney - for CPCoC Members Only!
